reviewText: Gave it as a gift. Would not play. Tried it on my computer, would only play for 20 minutes. Sux.
It's British humor. I bought it for the Vinnie Price scenes. It took me years to figure out what movie this was.
Silly movie. Replacing video i had.
Love the movie. Got here fine.
This one is for my mother-in-law and she loves it.
For all those Vincent Price movies, a bit of scary and funny at the same time.  Tastefully done and will be worth the purchase!
IT WOULD HAVE IF AMAZON UPDATED ITS INFORMATION.... HAD TO SEND IT BACK; BECAUSE WHAT I THOUGHT WAS Cd 0 WASNT AND IT WOULDNT PLAY ON OUR MACHINE

I saw this probably about 20 years ago and have been looking for a copy ever since.
Comedy gold! And Vincent Price!

This is a fun movie, spoofs alot of classic horror movies. Vincent Price is truly a master in this film, and even makes fun of himself. This is no academy award winner, but is just mindless enjoyment.
I seen this movies back in the 80's! Absolutely loved it! Very funny comedy. Been looking for it for years. Of course I find it at the great, almighty Amazon!
